title: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove
description: When performing an Update Test Suite action, it is not clear that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in 'X' being removed from the test suite.
OB: The user encounters confusion regarding the removal of test cases when selecting 'Y' in the dialog during the Update Test Suite action.
SR: The Update Test Suite action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will remove test cases, rather than performing an update based on the selection in the dialog.
